name.jp: もふもふウーパールーパー

description.en: A cute and soft Buur that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items. Hard part may be getting them back from him!
description.ar: A cute and soft Buur that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items. Hard part may be getting them back from him!
description.br: Um Buur fofo e macio que segue seu dono e recolhe itens caídos. A parte difícil pode ser recuperá-los dele!
description.cns: 一只可爱柔软的小羊驼跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。困难部分是从他那里把东西拿回来！
description.de: Ein flauschiges Baby Fluffy, das seinem Besitzer auf Schritt und Tritt folgt und dabei Gegenstände aufsammelt.
description.fi: A cute and soft Buur that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items. Hard part may be getting them back from him!
description.fil: A cute and soft Buur that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items. Hard part may be getting them back from him!
description.fr: Cet adorable plume nain de Flarine a été entraîné pour se promener avec son maître tout en ramassant les objets laissés par les monstres et en améliorant ses performances au combat.
description.id: Buur yang lembut nan imut yang setia mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan siap mengambil semua item drop. Namun akan sulit untuk mengambilnya kembali dari dia!
description.it: A cute and soft Buur that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items. Hard part may be getting them back from him!
description.jp: 突然変異したもふもふウーパールーパーを召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 베이비 부르르를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: A cute and soft Buur that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items. Hard part may be getting them back from him!
description.pl: A cute and soft Buur that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items. Hard part may be getting them back from him!
description.ru: Милый Буур с мягкой шёрсткой, который следует за владельцем и подбирает вещи. Сложность в том, чтоб эти вещи потом отобрать у Буура.
description.sp: Un lindo y suave Buur que sigue a su dueño recogiendo objetos soltados. ¡La parte difícil es quitárselos a él!
description.sw: A cute and soft Buur that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items. Hard part may be getting them back from him!
description.th: Buur ที่น่ารักและอ่อนนุ่มที่ติดตามเจ้าของไปรอบ ๆ และหยิบสิ่งของที่หล่นลงมา ส่วนที่ยากอาจจะได้พวกเขากลับมาจากเขา!
description.tw: 召喚或解除刺果獸寶寶，周圍有道具時會自動拾取。
description.vi: Một chú chó Buur dễ thương và mềm mại đi theo chủ nhân của nó và nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi. Phần khó có thể là lấy lại chúng từ anh ta!
